items.ja: Amorim's big moment - are Man Utd finally ready for lift off?

items.text_for_match: Amorim's big moment - are Man Utd finally ready for lift off? items.ja: Maguire heads Man Utd to victory against Liverpool
items.en: Maguire heads Man Utd to victory against Liverpool
items.text_for_match: Maguire heads Man Utd to victory against Liverpool Harry Maguire heads Manchester United to a 2-1 win against Liverpool - their first victory at Anfield since 2016.
